Hero.title: Learn to create, code and innovate today!
Hero.description: Discover web development and artificial intelligence in a fun, bilingual, and age-appropriate environment.

Who.title: Who is it for?
Who.description: From 8 to 18 years old, whether you're curious or passionate, Future Coders is made for you. No prior knowledge in computing or artificial intelligence is required.

Why.title: Why join us?
Why.paragraph1: Imagine, design and bring your own digital projects to life. From creating games to designing websites, let your imagination run wild!
Why.paragraph2: In a world where digital technology is everywhere, learning to code today means opening up numerous opportunities for the future. Develop skills that will be essential in tomorrow's world.
Why.paragraph3: Master essential programming concepts and problem-solving techniques that are valued worldwide. Develop logical thinking and analytical skills that will benefit you across all domains.

ProgramObjectives.title: Program Objectives
ProgramObjectives.description: Our workshops will enable you to:
ProgramObjectives.objective1: Understand the basics of web development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
ProgramObjectives.objective2: Discover artificial intelligence in a simple and fun way.
ProgramObjectives.objective3: Create your own projects, like a website or a mini-chatbot.
ProgramObjectives.objective5: Work in teams and collaborate on exciting projects.
ProgramObjectives.objective6: Build self-confidence by learning to solve technical problems.
ProgramObjectives.objective7: Develop initial technological expertise, essential for the future.
ProgramObjectives.objective8: Have fun while learning in a supportive and bilingual environment.

Program.title: Program
Program.description: From Monday to Friday, an adapted, progressive and interactive program
Program.day1Description: Learn the basics of computing and programming.
Program.day3Description: Discover artificial intelligence in a simple and fun way.
Program.day4Description: Create team projects and collaborate on exciting projects.
Program.day5Description: Present your projects and receive your end-of-week diploma.

Tools.title: Tools we use
Tools.description: We'll introduce you to developers' and creators' favorite tools, adapted to your age and easy to use:
Tools.vsCode: The essential code editor to bring your website ideas and projects to life.
Tools.scratch: The visual programming tool to create animations, games and interactive stories.
Tools.teachable: The artificial intelligence platform to create interactive and fun projects.

Price.title: Pricing
Price.description: A single and decreasing rate to meet all your needs!
Price.descriptionDay5: For a full week of discovery and learning.
Price.lastSentence: Special rates for local families and premium options for tourists available upon request.

Prof.text1: Web developer with over 7 years of experience, having worked for prestigious brands such as Chanel, Hermès, Crédit Agricole, Fortuneo and Leroy Merlin.
Prof.text2: Thanks to my technical expertise and caring teaching approach, I ensure that every child learns in a fun, safe environment adapted to their age.
Prof.desc1: Holding a BAFA certification, I have solid experience in leading activities for children and teenagers.
Prof.desc2: Projects completed for internationally renowned companies.
Prof.desc3: I take the time to understand each child's needs to help them progress.
Prof.desc4: I am committed to passing on essential skills for every child's future.

Testimonials.title: They experienced it and loved it!
Testimonials.description: Discover how our workshops transform curiosity into real skills.

testimonial1.name: Marie, 10 years old
testimonial1.text: I loved creating my first website! The activities were super fun and Younès explains everything really well.

testimonial2.name: Sophie, 12 years old
testimonial2.text: It was amazing to discover artificial intelligence. I didn't think it would be so simple and interesting!

testimonial3.name: Lucas, 14 years old
testimonial3.text: The team projects were exciting. I learned so much and made new friends.

Faq.title: Your questions, our answers
Faq.a1: Workshops take place from 9am to 1pm, with breaks to maintain participants' energy and concentration.
Faq.a2: To ensure a quality experience, we limit the number of participants to 8 per workshop.
Faq.q3: What are the prerequisites for participating?
Faq.a3: No prerequisites are necessary, our workshops are adapted to all levels, even for beginners.
Faq.q4: Does my child need to bring a computer?
Faq.a4: No, we provide all the necessary equipment for the workshops. Participants don't need to bring their own computer.
Faq.q5: What is the language of the workshops?
Faq.a5: The workshops are bilingual, in French and English, allowing each participant to express themselves in the language of their choice.
Faq.a6: To register, simply fill out the online registration form on our website. We will then contact you to finalize your registration.
Faq.q7: What can I do while my child is in the workshop?
Faq.a7: While your child is in the workshop, you can use your free time to explore Essaouira, its beaches, cultural heritage, and tourist activities. We are located next to a traditional hammam, a café, and a souvenir shop, allowing you to have a pleasant time while your child learns and has fun.

Footer.text: Give your children a technological future thanks to our web development and artificial intelligence workshops in Essaouira.
